Papers for VizSec 2015

Oct 22, 2015 • John R. Goodall

We have made the papers that will be presented at VizSec 2015 available on a password protected site for those who will be coming to the conference and want to read the papers ahead.

Please send an email to vizsec2015@easychair.org and we will send you the URL and password.

Get in Touch

Email questions to vizsec2016@easychair.org, or you can post to our Google group.

Follow @vizsec on Twitter!
